title: Intel Core i9 laptops are built to handle demanding work and heavy multitasking
snippet: Intel Core i9 laptops are built for creators, professionals and gamers who need extreme speed, smooth multitasking and reliable performance for demanding daily workloads.

title: Is Instagram listening? How to stop the app from showing creepy hyper-personalized ads
snippet: Instagram ads can feel eerily personal, leading to misconceptions that the app may be listening to you. However, you can follow this simple guide to make the ads less focused on you.

title: Gemini can now fix your pictures in Google Photos with a single prompt: here's how it works
snippet: Google Photos has now introduced an AI powerd editing feature for users in India which enables users to edit through voice or text prompts. Users can request personalized adjustments in various Indian languages like Hindi and English.

title: Better than Perplexity and Google AI Mode? Yahoo enters chat with new AI-powered search rival
snippet: Yahoo has launched its latest AI-powered search engine called Yahoo Scout, which aims to transform search results into direct answers using user data and web content. The feature is currently available to users in the US in beta.

title: WhatsApp launches 'Strict Account Settings': How to enable the new lockdown-style mode?
snippet: Meta introduced Strict account settings on WhatsApp, providing extreme protections against cyber attacks for users at risk, such as journalists. This feature limits media from non-contacts and restricts calls and group additions, but may degrade the messaging experience.

title: Meta posts stronger-than-expected Q4 results though costs continue to soar
snippet: The company earned $22.77 billion, or $8.88 per share, in the October-December quarter. That's up 9% from $20.84 billion, or $8.02 per share, in the same period a year earlier.

title: IBM beats fourth-quarter revenue estimates as AI clamor boosts software demand

title: Meta boosts annual capex sharply on superintelligence push, shares surge
snippet: Shareholders backed CEO Mark Zuckerberg's ambitious capital outlay, boosting Meta stock 10% in extended trading, as the company posted a 24% surge in advertising revenue - its mainstay - for the quarter ended December 31. It also forecast first-quarter revenue above Wall Street expectations.

title: Stratospheric internet could finally start taking off this year
snippet: Today, an estimated 2.2 billion people still have either limited or no access to the internet, largely because they live in remote places.
